review_title: Company hold my withdrawal from last…
review_text: Company hold my withdrawal from last one month..I was in profits so asked for withdrawal to prevent from losses, no response on e-mails, no proper response from chat..no ultimately I lost majority of my profits.

review_title: I have experienced with other trade…
review_text: I have experienced with other trade platforms as well I’m using those platforms since 2018 but there spread and leverages are huge hard to do a proper trade but I find go market very easy and fair with trading and spread and leverages
owner_answer: Thanks for sharing your experience. We are pleased to hear that you are enjoying the platform.

review_title: It looks difficult but once u start learning in Demo mode its easy
review_text: It’s easy to use
owner_answer: Thank you for sharing your experience with us.

review_title: Good customer service
review_text: Good customer service but the online chat help service is not great, much better to call in person.
owner_answer: Thank you for your feedback! We’re glad to hear you had a positive experience with our customer service team.

review_title: All good based on past 2 years…
review_text: All good based on past 2 years experience
owner_answer: Thank you for sharing your feedback!

review_title: This is my second review
review_text: This is my second review. I confirm the 5 stars. The withdrawal process, like the dashboard management in general, is easy and intuitive. The funds arrived within a few days. The trading conditions are exceptional, with spreads on major pairs often being zero. Very good.
owner_answer: Thank you for your feedback. We’re glad that our features and services have contributed to a smooth trading experience.

review_title: péssima!!
review_text:
péssima!!! deposito e retirada demorada, 

e tambem limparam meus lucros, sem mencionar nada... enfim não recomendo esse corretor... tem muitos outros por aí menos burocráticos em todos quesitos... minha experiência não foi boa... 

conta id 5026400
owner_answer:
Olá, Stephane,
Lamentamos saber da sua experiência e compreendemos a sua frustração em relação aos atrasos nos depósitos/saques e ao ajuste de conta que você mencionou.

Após analisarmos o seu caso internamente, reconhecemos que nossa comunicação sobre o ajuste poderia ter sido mais clara e também estamos revisando nossos processos para melhorar os tempos de processamento das transações e a forma como informamos os clientes quando ações são tomadas em suas contas.

Se você puder entrar em contato com nossa equipe de Suporte 24 horas por dia, 7 dias por semana, pelo e-mail support.mu@gomarkets.com, teremos prazer em analisar o seu caso em detalhes e ajudá-lo diretamente.

Agradecemos o seu feedback. Ele nos ajuda a melhorar nossos serviços para todos os clientes.

Atenciosamente,
Equipe GO Markets
